name: Survive the Temple
description:
Survive the trap system of an ancient temple! Dash through the lanterns in the correct order before the time runs out, or face certain death!

CONTROLS:

  • WASD/Arrows - Movement
  • Space - Jump/Walljump
  • Left Mouse Button - Dash towards your mouse cursor

RULES:

  • Lanterns always spawn in the previous order, only one new lantern appears per wave
  • Dash through the lanterns in the order they appear to proceed
  • The numbers start disappearing so better remember the order!
  • A maximum of 10 lanterns can be spawned in a wave, the oldest one is removed
  • Don't be afraid to move around, you can't get hurt when you aren't dashing
